content.about: List of Antique Appraisers provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art collections. With Over a decade combined experience ([1][2]) experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Charlotte area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Susan D.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Robert W.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend List of Antique Appraisers for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Sarah J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and List of Antique Appraisers delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Michael J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend List of Antique Appraisers for any antique appraisal needs.

content.about: Prestige Estate Services Team provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art collections. With Over a decade combined experience ([1][2]) experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Charlotte area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jessica R.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: James T.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

reviews.author: Linda T.
reviews.content: Prestige Estate Services Team's knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation Prestige Estate Services Team provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.
